title: Ellen Pao Trial Highlights Long Road To Ending Workplace Bias
teaser: NPR's Audie Cornish talks to Nitasha Tiku of The Verge about the latest in the Silicon Valley gender discrimination trial of Ellen Pao. Pao is suing a venture capital firm for $16 million in damages.
contentencoded: Copyright 2015 NPR. To see more, visit http://www.npr.org/.
